info.description: A RESTful API service for chat functionality
info.title: Notify Chat Service API

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password

200.description: Login successful - returns JWT token and user data

post.description: Register a new user with username, email, and password

get.description: Get all channels that the current user is a member of, separated by type

200.description: Object with direct and group channel lists

post.description: Create a new channel with the specified name and selected users

requestBody.description: Channel creation data with user selection

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific channel

put.description: Update the name of an existing channel

delete.description: Delete a channel (only channel owner can delete). This will remove all channel members and perform soft delete on the channel.

400.description: Bad request - channel not found or user is not owner

403.description: Forbidden - only channel owner can delete channel

put.description: Remove the current user from a channel

post.description: Add a user to a channel (only channel owner can add users)

delete.description: Remove a user from a channel (only channel owner can remove users)

get.description: Get all chat messages for a specific channel (paginated)
get.summary: Get chat messages in a channel

get.description: Get the current user's profile information

put.description: Update the current user's profile information (username, avatar, password)

get.description: Search for users by username (partial match for channel creation)

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization

members.description: List of members in the channel

createdAt.description: timestamp of when the message was created

senderId.description: ID of the user who sent the message

name.description: Optional for direct messages, required for group

avatar.description:
Avatar is optional and can be used to store a profile picture URL
It is not mandatory for the user to have an avatar.

valid.description: Valid is true if Time is not NULL
